AttachClusterToHub.title: AttachClusterToHub
AttachClusterToHub.summary: You can call the AttachClusterToHub operation to associate an Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster with a master instance of ACK One.

CreateHubCluster.title: CreateHubCluster
CreateHubCluster.summary: Creates a master instance in Alibaba Cloud Distributed Cloud Container Platform (ACK One).

DeleteHubCluster.title: DeleteHubCluster
DeleteHubCluster.summary: Deletes a master cluster in Alibaba Cloud Distributed Cloud Container Platform (ACK One).

DeletePolicyInstance.title: DeletePolicyInstance
DeletePolicyInstance.summary: Deletes a policy for associated clusters.

DeleteUserPermission.title: DeleteUserPermission
DeleteUserPermission.summary: Deletes the role-based access control (RBAC) permissions of a RAM user.

DeployPolicyInstance.title: DeployPolicyInstance
DeployPolicyInstance.summary: Deploys a policy instance in the clusters that are associated with a master instance.

DescribeHubClusterDetails.title: DescribeHubClusterDetails
DescribeHubClusterDetails.summary: Queries the details of a master instance in Alibaba Cloud Distributed Cloud Container Platform (ACK One).

DescribeHubClusterKubeconfig.title: DescribeHubClusterKubeconfig
DescribeHubClusterKubeconfig.summary: Queries the kubeconfig file of a master instance.

DescribeHubClusterLogs.title: DescribeHubClusterLogs
DescribeHubClusterLogs.summary: Queries the logs of a master cluster.

DescribeHubClusters.title: DescribeHubClusters
DescribeHubClusters.summary: You can call the DescribeHubClusters operation to query the master instances that belong to the current Alibaba Cloud account.

DescribeManagedClusters.title: Query the clusters that are associated with a master instance.
DescribeManagedClusters.summary: You can call the DescribeManagedClusters operation to query the clusters that are associated with a master instance.

DescribePolicyDetails.title: DescribePolicyDetails
DescribePolicyDetails.summary: Queries detailed information about a policy.

DescribePolicyGovernanceInCluster.title: DescribePolicyGovernanceInCluster
DescribePolicyGovernanceInCluster.summary: Queries detailed information about the policies used by the clusters that are associated with a master instance.

DescribePolicyInstances.title: DescribePolicyInstances
DescribePolicyInstances.summary: Queries policy instances that are deployed in the clusters associated with a master instance.

DescribePolicyInstancesStatus.title: DescribePolicyInstancesStatus
DescribePolicyInstancesStatus.summary: Queries detailed information about policy instances that are deployed in the clusters associated with a master instance.

DescribeUserPermissions.title: DescribeUserPermissions
DescribeUserPermissions.summary: Query the permissions of a Resource Access Management (RAM) user.

DetachClusterFromHub.title: DetachClusterFromHub
DetachClusterFromHub.summary: You can call the DetachClusterFromHub operation to disassociate clusters from a master instance.

GrantUserPermissions.title: GrantUserPermissions
GrantUserPermissions.summary: Grant permissions to a Resource Access Management (RAM) user.

UpdateHubClusterFeature.title: UpdateHubClusterFeature
UpdateHubClusterFeature.summary: Updates the configurations of a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster that serves as a master instance.

UpdateUserPermission.title: UpdateUserPermission
UpdateUserPermission.summary: Updates the role-based access control (RBAC) permissions of a RAM user.
